_instructions: 2. For PRODUCTION: Update cloudServerUrl and frontendUrl to production URLs
3. For DEVELOPMENT: Use localhost URLs as shown below
4. Run 'start-print-agent.bat' and follow the pairing process

localServices._note: These ports are for LOCAL HTTP servers on THIS machine (not cloud)

surveillance._note: These are DEFAULT values - actual values come from cloud after pairing

eventsScraper._comment: Events scraper runs daily to fetch Eventbrite events

_troubleshooting.camera_preview: Set showPreview: true to see what camera sees
